title: The return of URF????
body: Lately i've seen a lot of montages, with clips of urf in. now that also the new "URF thresh figure" is out i think it actually can come back???? pls let me know if this is false or true.

replies.body: The "URF Thresh figure" thing is something completely different from the game mode, it actually stands for "Ultra Random Figure". The URF there is a random figure that you can buy at a discounted price along with one you can choose.
It'll probably rotate back in someday. Who knows. There's a very small percentage of people who actually play/enjoy it anyways, so it's likely not to be for a while.
